name: Scoring Rubric for Butterfly Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of butterfly illustration. Focuses on representation vs. reality analysis, text-image literalization, and mask identity concepts.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of representational dynamics, understanding of visual literalization, and analysis of mask as identity tool.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the difference between representation (mask) and reality (butterfly) in the illustration?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of representation-reality dynamics, understands mask as commentary on representation, and interprets visual choices as thematic statements.
AI identifies representational aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some representational elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats mask as literal butterfly or misreads representational aspects.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive visual literalization of text and its relationship to story themes?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies visual literalization, connects form to textual themes, and understands 'mistakes' in text (BRVÃ“) as part of transformation theme.
AI recognizes some visual literalization aspects in the illustration.
AI shows limited awareness of visual literalization.
AI demonstrates no perception of visual literalization or treats text as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of mask as identity tool (eyes cut out, held before face)?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of mask as identity tool, understands 'looking through mask' as metaphor, and connects to story themes of transformation.
AI recognizes mask functions and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices mask but analysis is superficial.
AI treats mask as simple prop or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (real butterflies, hunger, dialogue) and presence (mask, text, woman) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of what's not shown, and analyzes selective representation as narrative choice.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct representational dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about mask vs. butterfly?
overall_assessment_guidance: The butterfly illustration particularly tests understanding of representation and visual literalization. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding representational and thematic statements in visual form.
